text:
Release date
November 2024
Question asked
ID 271: What is the difference between work-related accident and work-related injury?
ID 287: What is the difference between an ‘accident’ and an ‘injury’, and how should I count a
‘case’?
ESRS reference
ESRS S1 paragraph 86; ESRS S1 paragraph 88(b)(c)(d)(e); ESRS S1 paragraph AR83, ESRS S1
paragraph AR89, ESRS S1 paragraph AR91
4 The applicable datapoint relates to SFDR Indicator number 3 in Table 3 of Annex I.
